database.title: Agricola
database.abstract: Agricola (1970 to the present) covers U.S. agricultural and life sciences information. It consists of over 3.3 milion citations to journal articles, monographs, theses, patents, and technical reports. Subject areas include: agricultural economics and rural sociology, agricultural production, animal sciences, chemistry, entomology, food and human nutrition, forestry, natural resources, pesticides, plant science, soils and fertilizers, and water resources. Also includes related areas such as biology and biotechnology, botany, ecology, and natural history. Agricola corresponds to the Bibliography of Agriculture.
database.conditions: Use of this product is restricted to membersof the University of Alberta community andto users of the Library's physical facilities.It is the responsibility of each user to ensurethat he or she uses this product for individual,non-commercial educational or research purposesonly, and does not systematically download or retainsubstantial portions of information.

database.french_abstract: La base de données Agricola offre des ressources portant sur les sciences de l'agriculture et de la vie publiées aux États-Unis depuis 1970. Elle comprend plus de 3,3 millions de citations d'articles de périodiques, de livres, de thèses, de brevets et de rapports techniques. L'économie agricole, la sociologie rurale, la production agricole, les sciences animales, la chimie, l'entomologie, l'alimentation et la nutrition humaine, la foresterie, les ressources naturelles, les pesticides, les sciences végétales, les sols et les engrais, ainsi que les ressources en eau font partie des sujets couverts. Des domaines connexes tels que la biologie, la biotechnologie, la botanique, l'écologie et l'histoire naturelle y sont également abordés. Agricola est l'équivalent de la base de données Bibliography of Agriculture.
database.french_conditions: L'utilisation de cette ressource est limitée aux membres de la communauté universitaire et aux usagers se trouvant sur place, c'est-à-dire dans une bibliothèque de la University of Alberta. Il est interdit d'utiliser cette ressource à des fins autres que la recherche ou l'enseignement individuel et non commercial. Il est également interdit d'effectuer le téléchargement systématique du contenu de cette ressource ou d'en retirer des quantités substantielles d'information par d'autres moyens.

database.title: CAB Abstracts
database.abstract:
CAB Abstracts (1910 to the present) includes international coverage of all aspects of agriculture, horticulture, animal production and forestry including: crop production, plant protection and breeding; forestry and forest products; soil science, land use and water management; animal husbandry, health, breeding, nutrition and parasitology; dairy science and technology, agricultural engineering; economics; rural development, sociology and education; leisure, recreation and tourism. Many topics in the sciences basic to these activities are also covered, including the physiology, biochemistry, ecology, genetics, and biosystematics of the plants, animals, and microorganisms that are indexed as domesticated organisms, genetic resources, pests, pathogens, hosts, or potential economic resources. In human health and medicine, the emphasis is on: human nutrition, community and public health, tropical diseases, communicable diseases including AIDS, medical mycology, entomology, and parasitology. CABI = Centre for Agriculture and Biosciences International.

Also includes full text from a number of journals, conference proceedings, and review articles.
database.conditions: Use of this product is restricted to membersof the University of Alberta community andto users of the Library's physical facilities.It is the responsibility of each user to ensurethat he or she uses this product for individual,non-commercial educational or research purposesonly, and does not systematically download or retainsubstantial portions of information.

database.title: ABI Inform Complete
database.abstract:
ABI Inform Complete includes full-text journals, dissertations, working papers, key business and economics periodicals such as the Economist, country-and industry-focused reports, and downloadable data. It comprises the following titles:
  • ABI Inform Dateline: Includes local and regional business publications, including McClatchey Tribune titles, with news about issues such as local companies, analysis, and information on local markets .
  • ABI Inform Global: Includes in-depth coverage for thousands of publications, most of which are available in full text.
  • ABI Inform Trade & Industry: Includes in-depth coverage of companies, products, executives, trends and other topics.
database.conditions: Use of this product is restricted to membersof the University of Alberta community andto users of the Library's physical facilities.It is the responsibility of each user to ensurethat he or she uses this product for individual,non-commercial educational or research purposesonly, and does not systematically download or retainsubstantial portions of information.

database.short_description: Business & management articles including engineering, health, education sectors
database.french_short_description: Articles portant sur les affaires et la gestion, l'ingénierie, la santé et l'éducation.
database.french_abstract: La base de données ABI Inform indexe et fournit le résumé analytique d'articles provenant de plus de mille périodiques du domaine des affaires publiés depuis 1970. Le texte intégral d'articles provenant d'environ 600 des mille périodiques indexés est également inclus.
database.french_conditions: L'utilisation de cette ressource est limitée aux membres de la communauté universitaire et aux usagers se trouvant sur place, c'est-à-dire dans une bibliothèque de la University of Alberta. Il est interdit d'utiliser cette ressource à des fins autres que la recherche ou l'enseignement individuel et non commercial. Il est également interdit d'effectuer le téléchargement systématique du contenu de cette ressource ou d'en retirer des quantités substantielles d'information par d'autres moyens.
